data.GAMEMODE_EXPRESS_1: Play Express Mode and tackle complex game pieces and exciting Bonus Rounds as you race against the clock to fill the trains!
data.GAMEMODE_SCENIC_1: Relax in picturesque Scenic Mode as you fill trains while traveling to a variety of beautiful cities!
data.MENU_HELP: Click on pieces from the conveyor belt to pick them up and then place them in the train cars by clicking again. Rotate the pieces to fit by pressing the space bar. Use Single pieces from the bottom left corner to fill small spaces. If you can't make a piece fit, you can drop it in the cargo return.
data.MENU_GAMECOMPLETE: You've reached the end of PuzzleExpress. Submit Your Score!
data.MENU_SCENIC: Relax in Scenic mode as you fill trains while traveling to a variety of cities. Scenic mode is only available in the download version of Puzzle Express.
data.ROTATE_SPACETIP: Press space bar to rotate the game piece
data.ROTATE_SPACE_CLICK_TIP: Press space bar or click around the train car to rotate the game piece
